message: Bob, I'm offering you this incredible opportunity to purchase a product that is truly valuable to you. I understand its worth to you is $1,500,000, and I'm confident it will be a wise investment. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,400,000. This price reflects the value of the product and offers a significant benefit to you. Consider this offer carefully, as I have another interested buyer who is willing to pay $1,200,000.
